name: aditi-consulting-ai
description: Aditi Consulting AI - Advanced AI assistant for document processing and intelligent conversations.
author: Aditi Consulting

scripts.lint: cd server && yarn lint && cd ../frontend && yarn lint && cd ../collector && yarn lint
scripts.setup: cd server && yarn && cd ../collector && yarn && cd ../frontend && yarn && cd .. && yarn setup:envs && yarn prisma:setup && echo "Please run yarn dev:server, yarn dev:collector, and yarn dev:frontend in separate terminal tabs."
scripts.setup:envs:
cp -n ./frontend/.env.example ./frontend/.env && cp -n ./server/.env.example ./server/.env.development && cp -n ./collector/.env.example ./collector/.env && cp -n ./docker/.env.example ./docker/.env && echo "All ENV files copied!
"
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.prisma:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:setup: yarn prisma:generate && yarn prisma:migrate && yarn prisma:seed
scripts.render:build: yarn install && cd server && yarn install && cd .. && cd frontend && yarn install && yarn build && cd .. && cd collector && yarn install && cd .. && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('frontend/dist', 'server/public', {recursive: true})"
scripts.start: yarn prisma:generate && yarn prisma:migrate && yarn prod:server
scripts.render:start: yarn prisma:generate && yarn prisma:migrate && npx concurrently "yarn prod:server" "cd collector && yarn start" --kill-others
scripts.normalize:translations: cd frontend/src/locales && node normalizeEn.mjs && cd ../../.. && yarn lint && yarn verify:translations
